en.GMCM.Title.WildFoodEnable.Name: Wild Food
en.GMCM.Options.WildFood.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.WildFood.ToolTip: Enables crops and forage focused on edible herbs, fruits, nuts etc'.
en.GMCM.Title.WildFoodShip.Name: Add to Shipping Collection
en.GMCM.Options.WildFoodShipment.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.FaerieGardenShipment.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Title.FaerieGardenShip.Name: Add to Shipping Collection
en.GMCM.Title.FaerieGardenEnable.Name: Faerie Garden
en.GMCM.Options.FaerieGarden.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.FaerieGarden.ToolTip: Enables crops and forage focused on magical fruit, flowers, mushrooms etc.
en.GMCM.Title.CategoryOverrideEnable.Name: Category Override
en.GMCM.Options.CategoryOverride.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.CategoryOverride.ToolTip: Enables more detailed categories for items like mushrooms, herbs etc. Requires the mod Calcifer.
en.GMCM.Title.VanillaTweaksEnable.Name: Vanilla Tweaks Style Seeds
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaTweaks.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaTweaks.ToolTip: Enables seeds and saplings to match Vanilla Tweaks style.
en.GMCM.Options.SpecialOrders.Name: Special Orders
en.GMCM.Options.SpecialOrders.ToolTip: Enables special orders that correspond to this mod's new items. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.EasyRecipesEnable.Name: Easy Recipes
en.GMCM.Options.EasyRecipes.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.EasyRecipes.ToolTip: Set to true if you want machine recipes to be known immediately. Otherwise player learns recipes from NPCS. False by default.
en.GMCM.Options.ShippingCollection.Name: Enable Shipping Collection
en.GMCM.Options.ShippingCollection.ToolTip: Set to false if you do not want enabled items to be required for perfection or shipping achievement. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.MachineColorEnable.Name: Choose Machine Color
en.GMCM.Options.MachineColor.Name: Machine Color
en.GMCM.Options.MachineColor.ToolTip: Choose a color scheme for artisanal machines. Defaults to base.
en.GMCM.Options.Base.Name: Base
en.GMCM.Options.Black.Name: Black
en.GMCM.Options.BlackWhite.Name: Black & White
en.GMCM.Options.Dark.Name: Dark
en.GMCM.Options.Blue.Name: Blue

en.GMCM.Options.Mocha.Name: Mocha
en.GMCM.Options.Pink.Name: Pink
en.GMCM.Options.Purple.Name: Purple
en.GMCM.Title.QLCompatEnable.Name: Quaint Living
en.GMCM.Options.QL.Name: Enable Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.QL.ToolTip: Set to true to enable machine rules to accept Quaint Living's flowers and add new items. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.SMCompatEnable.Name: Serene Meadow
en.GMCM.Options.SM.Name: Enable Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.SM.ToolTip: Set to true to enable machine rules to accept Serene Meadow's flowers and add new items. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.VMVCompatEnable.Name: Visit Mt Vapius
en.GMCM.Options.VMV.Name: Enable Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.VMV.ToolTip: Set to true to enable machine rules to accept Visit Mt. Vapius's flowers and add new items. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.CMCCompatEnable.Name: Cornucopia More Crops
en.GMCM.Options.CMC.Name: Enable Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.CMC.ToolTip: Set to true to enable machine rules to accept Cornucopia More Crops's crops and add new items. True by default.
en.GMCM.Title.CMFCompatEnable.Name: Cornucopia More Flowers
en.GMCM.Options.CMF.Name: Enable Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.CMF.ToolTip: Set to true to enable machine rules to accept Cornucopia More Flowers's flowers and add new items. True by default.

en.GMCM.Title.PantryShip.Name: Gourmand

en.GMCM.Options.SOPantry.Name: Enable Special Orders
en.GMCM.Title.ShippingCollection.Name: Add Items to Shipping Collection
en.GMCM.Title.SpecialOrders.Name: Enable Special Orders
en.GMCM.Title.PresentLocations.Name: Make All Locations Available
en.GMCM.Options.PresentLocationsConfig.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.PresentLocationsConfig.Tool: Set to true for secret forage locations to always be present, instead of unlocking them by leveling skills and relationships. Defaults to False.
en.GMCM.Title.CookingConfig.Name: Cooking Instead of Crafting
en.GMCM.Options.Cooking.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Cooking.ToolTip: Sets mod to use cooking recipes and not artisan crafting. Requires Wild Food module to work. Defaults to false.
en.GMCM.Title.ColorSchemeConfig.Name: Color Scheme
en.GMCM.Options.ColorScheme.Name: Choose
en.GMCM.Options.ColorScheme.ToolTip: Choose a color scheme! Defaults to Base.
en.GMCM.Title.CakesConfig.Name: Cakes
en.GMCM.Options.Cakes.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Cakes.ToolTip: Adds the craftable cakes and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.TinyCakesConfig.Name: Tiny Cakes
en.GMCM.Options.TinyCakes.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.TinyCakes.ToolTip: Adds the craftable cupcakes, petit fours and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.MuffinsConfig.Name: Muffins
en.GMCM.Options.Muffins.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Muffins.ToolTip: Adds the craftable muffins, scones and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.BreadsConfig.Name: Breads
en.GMCM.Options.Breads.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Breads.ToolTip: Adds the craftable breads and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.DoughnutsConfig.Name: Doughnuts
en.GMCM.Options.Doughnuts.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Doughnuts.ToolTip: Adds the craftable doughnuts, eclairs and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.CookiesConfig.Name: Cookies
en.GMCM.Options.Cookies.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Cookies.ToolTip: Adds the craftable cookies, macarons, brownies and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PiesConfig.Name: Pies
en.GMCM.Options.Pies.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Pies.ToolTip: Adds the craftable pies, tarts and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
en.GMCM.Title.PuddingsConfig.Name: Puddings
en.GMCM.Options.Puddings.Name: Enable
en.GMCM.Options.Puddings.ToolTip: Adds the craftable puddings and corresponding machine. Defaults to true.
